video_plan.text: [sighs] ...with everything happening in the world right now... the wars, the conflicts, the anger everywhere... [thoughtfully] how are we supposed to find peace in all of this?
[warmly] That is exactly what Elder Bednar addressed in the last two General Conferences... [softly] He reminded us of a powerful promise from scripture.
[reverently] The Lord said in Doctrine and Covenants section one oh one... 'Let your hearts be comforted... for all flesh is in mine hands... be still and know that I am God.'
[pondering] Be still... [realizing] but how do we do that when everything around us is chaos?
[with conviction] Elder Bednar taught that 'be still' means more than just being quiet... [warmly] It means to remember and rely upon the Lord and His power at all times.
[softly] He promised that as we build the foundation of our lives on the rock of Jesus Christ... we can receive an individual and spiritual stillness of the soul.
[realizing] So the peace... it comes from within... from our connection to Christ.
[reverently] Elder Bednar testified... 'As we walk in the meekness of the Lord's Spirit, we will avoid and overcome pride and have peace in Him.' [deep breath] ...in Him.
